ai-ja335:1.3_0: and you were not born in that family:
ai-ja335:1.4_0: where you take it and let it go.”
ai-ja335:2.2_0: If anyone who makes themselves happy,
ai-ja335:3.1_0: The famous one, the supreme one,
ai-ja335:3.2_0: The one of great strength in this arisen body and mind,
ai-ja335:3.3_0: (Has great) power and strength: (but) being hasty,
ai-ja335:3.4_0: the giant by the powerful one, (thinking): It is slaughtered by the Rose-Apple Island,
ai-ja335:4.1_0: But having the measure of his deeds here,
ai-ja335:4.2_0: After completing the boon of himself,
ai-ja335:5.1_0: The fifth section for recitation on India.
